title: Gandhi [DVD]
creator_credit: Richard Attenborough, Indo-British Films Ltd, Goldcrest Films, National Film Development Corporation of India, International Film Investors and Columbia Pictures
brief_description: An epic account of Mahatma Gandhi’s lifelong struggle against British Imperialism in India, tracing his life from 1919 to his assassination in 1948. Filmed on a lavish scale mixing biography, history and adventure, Ben Kingsley’s gives an insightful performance as Gandhi. Co-starring Candice Bergen, Edward Fox, Sir John Gielgud, Martin Sheen, John Mills and Trevor Howard.
